name: Golden Hammer Anti-Pattern
description: Using a familiar tool or pattern for every problem, regardless of appropriateness
when_to_use:
Same solution applied to different problems
Forcing unfamiliar problems into familiar solutions
Resistance to learning new approaches
drawbacks:
Inappropriate solutions
Missed opportunities
System complexity
Poor performance
use_cases:
Using databases for all storage needs
Applying OOP to functional problems
Using same framework for all project types
